message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you.  I'm asking for $18,000 to start negotiations.  What do you think?
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not comfortable going above $12,000. Can you consider my offer of $12,000?
Bob, thanks for your offer.  I understand your perspective, but this product is worth significantly more to me than your offer. How about we meet closer to the middle at $15,000?
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $10,000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me there?
